column4: why, WHY must everything I do require a degree from M.I.T? I thought ubuntu was for humans? I'm I human-oid or something?!?!?!?!
Linux is user friendly, it's just picky about its friends :)
I find Linux rude and unforgiving lol
that's just the steep learning curve. once you are at a certzain experience level you'll find the windows way childish and for retards
